meta.objective: Run final diagnostics to verify system health and archive the success state.

phases.name: Project Sign-off
phases.description: Execute full diagnostics to confirm zero errors before closing the project.

tasks.action: Run `bash run_full_diag.sh` to execute the full diagnostic suite. Verify that the output in `main/lgp.txt` shows 'PASSED' with no critical errors.
Run `python3 main/comprehensive_analysis.py` to ensure no new static analysis issues (syntax, imports, state leaks) have been introduced during the fixes.
Run `python3 main/auto_log_cleaner.py` to archive the current logs, marking a clean slate for production usage.
